Program for Transparency and Equity in Spending on Social Protection III
Programa de Transparencia y Equidad del Gasto en Protección Social III

description.narrative: El objetivo de esta operación, así como de la serie programática, es mejorar la transparencia, equidad y eficiencia del gasto en protección social para los pobres, y aumentar su capacidad de promover la acumulación de capital humano. Esta operación es la tercera y última de una serie Programática en Apoyo a Reformas de Política (PBP) a conformarse de tres operaciones.

The objective of this operation and the programmatic series is to make social protection spending for the poor more transparent, equitable, and efficient and to enhance its ability to foster human capital accumulation.This operation is the third and last in a series of three programmatic policy-based loans (PBPs).
Commitment in third quarter of 2018
Disbursement in fourth quarter of 2018
Interest repayment in first quarter of 2019
Interest repayment in first quarter of 2020
Interest repayment in first quarter of 2021
Interest repayment in third quarter of 2019
Interest repayment in third quarter of 2020
Interest repayment in third quarter of 2021
Loan repayment in first quarter of 2021
Loan repayment in third quarter of 2021
